about_the_game:
More Than Just Running a Tea House!
Provide a warm tea experience while adapting to the city's vibrant dynamics. Step out of being an ordinary business owner and dive into a simulation where you set the rhythm of the city!

Oops, I’m Clumsy!

During busy times, you might drop tea trays, scatter broken glass, or spill tea everywhere! But if you neglect the cleanup, things will only get messier. Be careful—keep both your customers and your floors safe!

The Art of Service

Serving tea, coffee, and other refreshments promptly to your customers is crucial. Carry your tray carefully, find the right table, and ensure no orders are missed. Be quick but cautious!

Customer Satisfaction

If customers don’t get their orders on time, they might grumble and leave your tea house. Not everyone follows the rules! You’ll need to politely (!) remind unruly customers to behave, or the municipal officers might hit you with a fine. But beware—some customers might not take it well, leading to unexpected chaos! Running a tea house isn’t easy, I’m telling you.

Watch Out: The Inspectors Are Coming!

Smoking indoors is strictly prohibited, but not all customers follow the rules. Make sure to warn them and keep order before the inspectors fine you. Otherwise, the penalty falls on you!

Lively City Chats

Customers love to chat based on their mood, often sharing the freshest gossip in town. Don’t forget to eavesdrop while moving around the tables!

Market and Online Orders

You can restock supplies by shopping at the market or placing online orders. However, online orders can be a bit pricey. Managing your budget wisely will make your job much easier!

So, What Would You Do If This Tea House Was Yours?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
